properties.publicRemarks:
Situated on a desirable corner lot with desert landscaping and an extended driveway, this stylish home offers a warm welcome and smart layout. A covered walkway leads to the front entry. Inside, you're greeted by a spacious living room with vaulted ceilings and a wall of windows viewing the backyard and sparkling pool and spa.  A formal dining area—formerly the fourth bedroom could also be used as an office or a fourth bedroom.

The open-concept kitchen and family room feature a cozy fireplace, a center island, black granite countertops, and stainless-steel appliances, pull out drawers in the cabinets, including a gas range, microwave, large sink, and refrigerator with ice maker. 4 large windows offer excellent light. Freshly painted walls and recent repairs reflect the home's well-maintained condition.

The split bedroom floor plan provides ideal privacy. The primary suite with vaulted ceiling is located to the right of the entry and includes direct access to the pool/spa and backyard retreat. The hall near the kitchen leads to a Full Bath and Two guest bedrooms that share a versatile open space—perfect for a TV lounge, study area, or home school setup.

Conveniently located in the hall near the Primary is a laundry area and access to a deep two-car garage with utility sink and built-in storage. The backyard is designed for relaxation and entertaining, with low-maintenance landscaping and a long, covered patio—partially solid for shaded dining and partially slatted for filtered light. Enjoy stunning views of the South Mountains while dining al fresco. A storage shed adds extra utility, and the split-zone HVAC system ensures year-round comfort.
 
Near Eisenhower Health main campus, Desert Willows Golf Resort. 3 Grocery stores, restaurants and the I-10 on ramp nearby on Monterey or Cook Street. This is an excellent centrally located neighborhood with No HOA dues and in the desert hub.

properties.publicRemarks:
Are you looking for that special retreat that enables you to Lock up your home and leave with the peace of mind that your home is safe and secure?   We have just the home that you are looking for at the Retreat at Desert Willow.  This is a Plan #4/Enclave Home with a powder room at the entry, and 3 en Suite Bedrooms, all with walk in closets.  The Penthouse  home is fully wired for security and  includes a 75' Smart Television in the Living area.  Beautiful 30 x 30 upgraded tiles throughout the common areas of the home.   The kitchen will be the envy of all of your friends with updated stainless steel appliances, beautiful tile backsplash and Quartz countertops, a huge walk in pantry, and a large Island ready for you to entertain.
       The sliding doors open all the way providing the enjoyment of your indoor/outdoor living experience taking you to the expansive wrap around balcony with a gas fireplace and cable ready for your big screen television.  The Beautiful Clubhouse has a sitting area, pool table, meeting space, a Resort style pool area, with a separate lap pool, full Gym and a spa.  There is a private golf cart path to the Desert Willow golf course and restaurant.
   Affordable HOA dues that cover Pool maintenance, building fire Insurance, Water, Pest Control, Desert Willow Golf membership (Discounted rates), Cable/Internet (includes, HBO, Showtime, High speed internet), Common area gates, road maintenance, and the Clubhouse and gym

properties.publicRemarks: **AVAILABLE JUNE 1, 2025*** 74131 Imperial CT E. 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath, plus den/office. Beautifully designed, offered partially furnished at $3750 or fully furnished at $4000 per month. Open floor plan home, that offers solar, pool, and mini-split air conditioners in the dining room, primary bedroom, and second bedroom, which allows you to cool the space you're in without using central air. Open concept home with abundant natural light throughout. Enjoy updated appliances and an oversized center island perfect for family and entertaining friends. This home is located just minutes from Acrisure Arena, Disney Cotino, Classic Club Golf course, Desert Willow golf course, and The world-famous Gardens El Paseo where you will enjoy a nice stroll, fine dining and shopping. When you just want to relax, step into the large backyard where you'll find your private pool and patio perfect for outside entertaining day or night. This home is turnkey ready for you to enjoy. If you are thinking about making Palm Desert your home, this is the perfect place for you and your family to begin that journey. HOA, monthly pool service and gardening service included in rent, to be paid by owner. Tenant will pay annual Net metering overage***This home will be available June 1, 2025***

properties.publicRemarks: Stand alone building includes reception, three offices, & two restrooms. Warehouse includes (2) 12x14 roll-up doors. Fenced yard. Well designed industrial building. Excellent mid-valley location in the Dinah Shore Crossings Business Park along the Dinah Shore Drive Corridor between Monterey Ave & Portola Ave in Palm Desert. Well maintained business park with low association fees. Low association dues pay for trash, outside buildings, maintenance, driveway, etc. Currently houses a Servpro franchise.

properties.publicRemarks: Welcome home to 65 Kavenish in prestigious Rancho Mirage Country Club. This California Villa model is offered turn-key furnished and move-in ready with vintage glamour. Featuring 2,452 SF of living space. Condo offers the perfect balance of indoor/outdoor living—scenic golf course views, pool & spa with fountain PLUS ample deck space for poolside lounging and entertaining complete with built-in BBQ outdoor kitchen! Inside vaulted ceilings over large great room with raised hearth fireplace, formal dining area and built-in wet bar (with mini-fridge) link to spacious eat-in kitchen with breakfast bar. Primary suite feels tucked away, with high ceilings, private enclosed patio, cedar lined walk-in closet and a spa-like master bath that includes stall shower, bidet, skylights and separate soaking tub. Two additional generous sized bedrooms for guests. 2-Car garage with additional storage PLUS golf cart garage! Community offers 10 hole-golf course onsite at minimal annual cost. 24-Hour manned guard gate brings added peace of mind. Unit would be ideal as seasonal retreat or full-time sanctuary. Enjoy the spacious interior, lounge poolside, entertain, stargaze—this is the IDEAL property to call HOME! Centrally located adjacent to Eisenhower Medical Center as well as new development Cotino, a Storyliving by Disney™ Community. Close to El Paseo shopping & dining district, Trader Joe's, Whole Foods, hiking trails, McCallum Theater, Palm Springs & more! Stop searching & START living!

properties.publicRemarks: Nestled in the highly desirable gated community of Versailles, this stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bath home offers an exceptional blend of luxury and comfort. Spanning 3,075 sq. ft., the residence features high ceilings, a formal entryway, and an elegant double-door entrance. Step through a beautifully landscaped gated courtyard, adorned with lush foliage, and into a thoughtfully designed interior filled with natural light. The inviting family room, complete with a cozy gas fireplace, seamlessly connects to the spacious gourmet kitchen, which boasts a large center island with sink, granite countertops, a gas cooktop, and ample cabinetry. The primary suite is a private retreat, featuring a large walk-in closet, an en-suite bath, and direct access to the pool and spa. Outside the custom stacked stone accents its elegant architecture. The backyard oasis features a flagstone pool deck, a tranquil spa, gazebo, and a well-appointed patio, perfect for entertaining or relaxing in the serene setting. Adding to its appeal, this home is located in the Imperial Irrigation District (IID), offering lower electricity rates to help save on utility bills. Plus, it sits right across the street from Cotino - A Storyliving by Disney community.

properties.publicRemarks:
SIGNIFICANT PRICE IMPROVEMENT!    Located in the highly desirable city of Rancho Mirage.  This home is ready for it's new home owners and it could be you. This Tuscan inspired estate exudes Old World Charm and elegance behind the gates of ESCALA. 

There are five bedrooms,,that could have mulitiple uses, flex space i.e., office, zen room, art studio, you make it yours.  Four bedrooms have ensuites. This residence is a masterpiece of craftsmanship and timeless design.  From the moment you arrive you are welcomed by beautifully landscaped entry and your worries could melt away.  Walk through the front couryard which features a tiered water fountain that sets the tone for the tranquil ambiance that flows throughout the property.  

Lush gardens bloom year-round, offering a vibrant display of color and fragrance in every season.  Once you step inside you're greeted by soaring ceilings and unparalled mountain views.  An expansive floor to ceiling Cantera stone fireplace anchors the great room creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.  The formal dining room allows for elegant gatherings.  Three sets of French doors open to the covered back patio with fireplace overlooking the saltwater, pebbletech pool and spa and manicured gardens.  

The heart of the home is the gourmet kitchen, a chef's dream, equipped with a VIKING 6 burner and griddle range with two ovens.  In addition two VIKING wall ovens, micro-wave and  Sub Zero tower refridgerator and freezer, all Stainless Steel.   The design is perfect for culinary creations and enteraining guests.  The upgrades continue with custom cabinetry, solid granite counter tops and oversized center island with built in beverage refridgeration drawers, and elegant limestone backsplace.  The additional wet bar adjacent to the great room continues the entertainers dream layout.  

The outdoor oasis is equally impressive with breathtaking mountain views.  The home features a resort-style pool and spa, four dramatic water features, providing a tranquil retreat for relaxation and recreation. 

The over 23,000 sq. ft. lot has mature citrus trees and an herb garden.  This exceptional estate captures the essence of luxurious Tuscan living, offering privacy, elegance, and unparalleled  beauty.   This is a rare opportunity to own a timless masterpiece in a breathtaking setting.  Extensive upgrade list is available under documents.
properties.sourceSystemName: Greater Palm Springs Multiple Listing Service
